name: Jaxx T
bio:
Hailing from Singapore, Jasper Tay, known as JAXX T is an open-format DJ, event organizer, and musical curator.

Formerly the musical consultant for Club Myst (2018 DJ Mag Rank #41 Nightclub), JAXX T drew from an eclectic selection in each genre, never sticking with a playlist - ensuring each live performance is unique.

JAXX T boasts major accomplishments such as winning the DONAROO Festival DJ Competition in San Francisco and opening for Grammy nominated and winning artists such as Jhene Aiko, Ty Dolla $ign, and Elley Duh√©.

JAXX T is also the co-founder of Dirty Not Sorry, a San Francisco-based event promotion company & artist collective. Since founding the brand in 2020, JAXX T and his team have produced 50+ yearly events - bringing many national and international artists to the city for the first time and extending the platform to hundreds of local DJs and producers.

With his recent release of 'This Ain't Love' on CLUBWRK, Will Sparks imprint, JAXX T is working hard to grind a new Big Room Techno sound for his fans in San Francisco, Singapore, and beyond.
